alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 19 at 11:33AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following areas, Bamberg and Orangeburg. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1133 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orangeburg, Bamberg, Brookdale, Orangeburg County Airport, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Claflin College, Rowesville, Cordova, Cope, Edisto, Wilkinson Heights and Prince of Orange Mall. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 145 and 157. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
